name: Soul Harvest
description: Soul Harvest is a fast paced local multiplayer strategy game set in the depths of Hell! Play as Archdemons fighting for the domination of the underworld, harvest souls to summon armies of minions or to cast unholy magicks and send your enemies into oblivion!
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 Processor: 1GHz or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: VGA 1204x768 Storage: 200 MB available space Additional Notes: Should run on a computer that has less than 5 years
